text: قالوا۟ ما انتم الا بشر مثلنا وما انزل الرحمن من شىء ان انتم الا تكذبون

translations.translation: They said, 'You are nothing but human beings like ourselves. The All-Merciful has not sent down anything. You are simply lying.'
You are only men like us," they replied; "Ar-Rahman has not sent down any thing. You are speaking only lies."
They said: “We have been sent to you as Messengers.” The people of the town said: “You are only human beings like ourselves, and the Merciful Lord has revealed nothing. You are simply lying.”
The people said, "You are mere mortals like us and the Beneficent God has sent nothing. You are only liars."
They said, “You are nothing but mortals like us; the Most Gracious has not sent down anything – you are nothing but liars.”
They said: "You are only human beings like ourselves, and the Most Gracious has revealed nothing. You are only telling lies."
They said: You are naught but mortals like ourselves, nor has the Beneficent Allah revealed anything; you only lie.
They said, 'You are naught but mortals like us; the All-merciful has not sent down anything. You are speaking only lies.'
They said: Ye are but mortals like unto us. The Beneficent hath naught revealed. Ye do but lie!
They replied, "You are nothing but mortal men like us and the Merciful God has not revealed anything. You are surely lying."
They said: ye are but human beings like ourselves; the Compassionate hath not sent down aught; ye are only lying.
They said, ‘You are no other than human beings like us, and the All-beneficent has not sent down anything, and you are only lying.’
The (people) said: "Ye are only men like ourselves; and (Allah) Most Gracious sends no sort of revelation: ye do nothing but lie."
They (people of the town) said: "You are only human beings like ourselves, and the Most Beneficent (Allah) has revealed nothing, you are only telling lies."
But they said: 'You are only humans like ourselves. The Merciful has not sent down anything, your speech is but lies'
They said, “You are nothing but humans like us, and the Gracious did not send down anything; you are only lying.”
They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."
[36:15] They said, ‘You are nothing but humans like us, and the Compassionate One has revealed nothing. You are only lying!’

They said) i.e. the apostles said: (Ye are but mortals) human beings (like unto us. The Beneficent hath naught revealed) He has not revealed any Scripture or sent any messenger. (Ye do but lie) about Allah!

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبعدما سمع المشركون منهم ما سمعوا { قَالُواْ } في جوابهم مستبعدين منكرين: { مَآ أَنتُمْ } أيها المدعون لرسالة الواحد الأحد الصمد
 الفرد الوتر
 الذي
[الإخلاص: 3-4] { إِلاَّ بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا } لا مناسبة لكم مع مرسلكم الذي هو من جنس البشر
 فلا بدَّ من المناسبة بين المرسل والرسل { وَ } دعواهكم الإنزال والإرشاد من عند الإله المنزه عن المكان والجهة ما هي إلا غرور وتلبيس { مَآ أَنَزلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ } المستغني عن الزمان والمكان
 المنزه ذاته عن سمات الحدوث والإمكان { مِن شَيْءٍ } إذ امثال هذه الأفعال إنما هي من لوازم الأجاسم وأوصاف الإمكان
 وهو سبحانه على الوجه الذي وصفتم شأنه مقدس عن أمثاله { إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلاَّ تَكْذِبُونَ } يعني: ظهر من دعواكم واستنادكم أمثال هذه الأفعال إلى ربكم أنه ما أنتم في دعواكم هذه إلا كاذبون
 مفترون على ربكم ما هو منزه عنه


وبعدما تفطن الرسل منهم الإنكار والإصرار المؤكد { قَالُواْ } في جوابهم أيضاً على سبيل المبالغة والتأكيد

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
ويرجحه قول الكفرة: { ما أنتم إِلا بشرٌ مثلُنا } إذ هذه محاورة إنما تقال لمَن ادعى الرسالة
 أي: ما أنتم إلا بشر
 ولا مزية لكم علينا
 { وما أنزلَ الرحمنُ من شيءٍ } أي: وحياً
 { إِن أنتم إِلا تكْذِبون } فيما تدعون من الرسالة
